about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in The Erebus Accord, a lore-rich pixel art Action RPG set within a vast, underground facility. As chaos unfolds, you must navigate the darkness, contain escaped horrors, and restore order before humanity's deepest secret is revealed.

FORGE YOUR STRENGTH

Defeat aberrations and consume their power to unlock new classes. Conquer the facility at your own pace by blasting through challenges or utilizing tactics and enemy weaknesses against them. Each class will offer unique gameplay and strengths to cater to your style of gameplay.

CONTAIN THE HORRORS

A containment breach has occurred at the Facility, as a fresh recruit who's been touched by fate, responsibility now rests on your shoulders to seal the escaped horrors and eliminate any entities that could threaten the Accord.

EXPLORE THRESHOLD

Help stranded scientists, reveal classified reports, and crush the rise of dangerous cults. The Facility offers a sprawling, interconnected set of rooms that adjust with every decision you make, reflecting your choices as you unravel its secrets. Lift the lockdown and unlock new areas, gradually expanding the map as you progress.

LEARN THEIR STORY

All entities, from security personnel to the most vile of horrors, have a story to tell. Explore interconnected plots and detailed reports, utilize this knowledge to identify enemy weaknesses. Uncover secrets of the Veil and the Accord.

CHOOSE YOUR DIFFICULTY

We value player choice, face the Facility at your own pace:

  • Story Mode - For those who enjoy dialogue, exploration, and a smooth experience with little action or punishment

  • Classical - A traditional hack and slash experience with no focus on tactics or modifiers

  • Tactical - The intended experience. Plan your approach, adapt to enemy behaviors, and navigate the Facility's layout to survive

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon violence and blood in environment
